home_subtitle: Welcome to the world of grooming. Your confidence is our mission. Elevate your style to new heights here, in our barbershop. Discover the pleasure of being stylish. Your hair deserves it.
home_aboutUs_text: At Uncle Ve, we believe that a barbershop isn't just about cutting hair and shaving beards. We provide professional service, the best specialists, stylish salon decor, and a unique atmosphere! Just trust us once to stay forever.
home_aboutUs_CV: We always looking for new talents! Send us your CV
home_gallery_subtitle: Take a visual journey through our
gallery_subtitle: Welcome to the gallery of our barbershop, where every photo is a moment of style and professionalism.
services_mens_haircut_description: Includes haircut with scissors/clippers, hair washing and professional styling.
services_mens_haircut_beard_description: Includes haircut with scissors/clippers, hair washing, professional styling and beard correction with trimmer/shaver/clippers, hair washing and professional styling.
services_beard_correction_description: Performed with clippers and a shaver/razor to create its shape.
services_clipper_cut_beard_description: Includes clipper haircut and beard styling with clipper/trimmer/shaver/shaver.
services_father_son_description: Haircut for Father and Son (child from 8 to 14 years old).
barbers_subtitle: Our team is a close-knit family of skilled professionals dedicated to elevating your grooming experience.
barbers_info_title: Do you want to join us?
barbers_barber_join_us: Do you want to join us?
